speaker: Customer
text: You have reached the voicemail of John Smith. Please leave a message after the beep.

speaker: Agent
text: Hi John, this is Linda from Apex Collections. I'm calling about your outstanding balance of seven hundred dollars.

speaker: Customer
text: For a quicker response, please leave your name and number.

speaker: Agent
text: You can reach me at one eight hundred five five five zero seven one zero. It's important we discuss this matter.

speaker: Customer
text: Thank you for reaching out, I will get back to you soon.
